```{r message=F}
library(units)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
gg <- readRDS('./data/247.rds')
gg <- drop_units(gg)
```

```{r message=F}
p <- ggplot(data=gg, aes(x=dt,y=speed,color=group)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth() + labs(colour = "Group", x="Date", y="Speed (km/hr)", title="Speed of team 247 during RR2019" )
```

```{r}
ggplotly(p)
```
